response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering it to you at a special price of $1,350,000, which we believe is a fair compromise between its value to us and its perceived value to you. This offer is valid for a limited time, so please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
